title: William Relph
text:
William Relph (26 January 1900 – September 1978) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="outside%20forward">outside forward</a> who appeared in the <a href="The%20Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Ashington%20A.F.C.">Ashington</a> and <a href="Brentford%20F.C.">Brentford</a>.
Honours.
Blyth Spartans
